title: Advanced Organizer Strategies for Improving High-Level Academic English Reading Skills in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Online real-time classes conducted in limited smartphone environments for graduate students needing to improve scientific paper reading comprehension in mathematics

learning_goals: Learners can extract core concepts from math-related academic texts with over 80% accuracy using advance organizers (background knowledge activation) strategies.
Learners can interpret complex sentence structures in math academic papers with over 70% accuracy by applying listening-reading parallel strategies.
Learners can improve comprehension by over 30% in academic reading by completing prior knowledge questionnaires and utilizing audio-supported materials.

resources: Weekly Academic Reading Passages (2–3 Passages, PDF)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
